    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:25.919
    | text      = dog whistles, like constantly saying,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:28.000
    | text      = we the people, after saying something vaguely racist and threatening.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:31.600
    | text      = Which was what Jack Swagger's character, for the most part, was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:34.480
    | text      = Gotcha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:35.120
    | text      = The writers built this feud around the idea that Jack Swagger and his manager, Zeb Colter,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.279
    | text      = would cut promos about how they're what America really is about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:42.639
    | text      = And Del Rio didn't belong here, and certainly didn't deserve to be champ.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:46.720
    | text      = The plan, obviously, is for Swagger to be a big shithead who antagonizes Del Rio,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:51.360
    | text      = all culminating in a pay-per-view where Del Rio defeats the racist villain.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:55.360
    | text      = And that's more or less what happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:56.960
    | text      = It's just basic wrestling storylines, all things considered, with one very basic and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:01.759
    | text      = massive twist, namely that the ethnic character was not the default bad guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:07.200
    | text      = Yeah, that's good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:08.399
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:08.879
    | text      = That's nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:09.759
    | text      = Whether you're a fan of it or not, it's pretty dumb to try and argue against the idea that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:13.759
    | text      = pro-wrestling has xenophobia in its DNA.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:16.720
    | text      = So much of the business has been built on noble white heroes defeating scary,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:20.480
    | text      = sometimes ethnic, but sometimes not, foreign heels.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:23.440
    | text      = Uh, so, of course, there was the very unfortunate case of the group Kai and Tai,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:28.320
    | text      = who were a late 90s group of Japanese wrestlers who had their promos dubbed like they were
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:32.480
    | text      = in an old Godzilla movie.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:34.159
    | text      = And they might or may not have been in Yakuza, and also tried to cut off Val Venis's penis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:39.440
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:40.320
    | text      = I remember Val Venis's penis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:42.240
    | text      = I remember that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:43.279
    | text      = That, I remember that being in the 90s and thinking, this is fine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:48.639
    | text      = And I'm sure Alex did too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:50.000
    | text      = And now that I look back on it, I'm like, wow, they could just do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:54.480
    | text      = Huh?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:54.799
    | text      = I'm going to guess that Alex didn't do an episode of his show about how this is demonizing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:58.639
    | text      = Japanese Americans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:59.600
    | text      = I really don't think he did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:01.279
    | text      = There have been plenty of very racist gimmicks that are kind of embarrassing to look back
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:05.360
    | text      = at, like the witch doctor, Papa Shango, or the dancing African warrior, Saba Simba,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:11.120
    | text      = the literal terrorist, Muhammad Hassan, or the cannibal headhunter, Kamala.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:16.799
    | text      = The list goes on and on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:18.480
    | text      = The roots of so many easy bad guy tropes were created with guys like the Iron Sheik, Nikolai
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:23.360
    | text      = Volkov, and Sergeant Slaughter when he decided to side with a rock during the Gulf War.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:28.159
    | text      = They often do this very poorly and with very little class.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:31.279
    | text      = But ultimately, what the WWE is in the business of doing is creating emotional responses to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:35.759
    | text      = their product.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:36.799
    | text      = One of the best way to do that is to create characters that fit pretty easy archetypes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:41.039
    | text      = and have them yell at each other about how their archetypes are in conflict with each
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:44.320
    | text      = other.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:44.559
    | text      = Right now, for example, in the WWE, one of the top bad guys is Daniel Bryan, and his
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:50.159
    | text      = character is basically just a preachy vegan environmentalist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:53.519
    | text      = Wait, he's a bad guy now?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:54.879
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:55.279
    | text      = Last I heard, we were all big fans of him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:57.120
    | text      = No, everyone still loves him because he's really talented, and he's really good at his
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:00.960
    | text      = character, but he's a bad guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:02.080
    | text      = Oh, okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:02.720
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:03.120
    | text      = He won the WWE Championship and remade the belt with hemp because he refused to wear
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:07.440
    | text      = a belt made of dead cows.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:08.720
    | text      = Hilarious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:09.680
    | text      = He's a guy who's taking a lot of the stereotypes of liberals, eco-crusaders, and then he performs
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:15.279
    | text      = them as a bad guy with amazing skill.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:17.359
    | text      = And you know what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:18.400
    | text      = I haven't heard any vegans or environmentalists or liberals screaming about how this is meant
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:22.480
    | text      = to demonize their positions, and I suspect it's because they're not a bunch of big old
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:26.480
    | text      = dum-dums.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:27.440
    | text      = They get that there are certain things that are kind of annoying about their positions,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:30.960
    | text      = and it's in good fun to see those things exaggerated to create a villainous character out of it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:35.440
    | text      = This is how the Tea Party folks and Alex should have responded to Jack Swagger if they were
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:40.000
    | text      = adults.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:41.039
    | text      = They should have realized and recognized that, yeah, there do seem to be a bit of, you know,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:45.440
    | text      = at least a couple fucked up racists among our ranks, and that's something that could
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:48.880
    | text      = stand a little bit of exaggeration or parody in the interest of telling a compelling wrestling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:53.119
    | text      = story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:54.079
    | text      = Ultimately, it could have even been an opportunity to have a much-needed conversation about what
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:57.839
    | text      = is and is not acceptable within their communities, but they can't do any of that for two reasons.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:04.400
    | text      = Especially people like Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:06.079
    | text      = One, they took it personally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:08.160
    | text      = Deep down, they knew that the things that Jack Swagger and Zeb Coulter and their characters,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:12.799
    | text      = the things that they were exaggerating and parodying were actually things that they themselves
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:17.440
    | text      = believed, and they took the presentation of Swagger as the bad guy for holding those beliefs
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:22.000
    | text      = as a personal criticism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:23.759
    | text      = And two, they're goddamn con men looking for anything they can do to raise their profile.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:28.880
    | text      = The fact that Jack Swagger said that he liked Alex Jones is the best fucking thing to ever
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:33.279
    | text      = happen for Alex Jones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:35.119
    | text      = Getting on Piers Morgan's show was big for Alex's exposure, but Alex knows that this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:39.119
    | text      = has the potential to be gigantic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:41.519
    | text      = The rub is that it can only be gigantic if Alex can capitalize on it, and laughing it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:46.000
    | text      = off as a storyline in wrestling, that's not how con men capitalize.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:50.640
    | text      = Ultimately, I think it's super interesting as a glimpse into how desperate all of these
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:54.480
    | text      = right-wing folks are for attention.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:56.400
    | text      = Alex and Glenn Beck both went completely nuts when a wrestling character mentioned them,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:01.519
    | text      = because they knew that if they could penetrate that market, they had a chance to really balloon
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:04.880
    | text      = their ranks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:06.240
    | text      = It's also interesting to see this happen at the time it does.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:09.279
    | text      = We're seeing that in February 2013, Alex is in a very defensive position about media covering
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:14.720
    | text      = him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:15.279
    | text      = There's the weeks-long freakout about Piers Morgan that seems to be coming to a close,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:19.039
    | text      = kind of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:20.000
    | text      = Then on our last episode, we saw him freaking out about CNN and The Atlantic accurately
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:24.400
    | text      = covering him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:25.440
    | text      = This opportunity to lash out at the WWE could not have come at a better time for him, and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:30.079
    | text      = I bet we're going to be hearing a whole lot about this in the future.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:33.440
    | text      = Yeah, that sounds right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:34.480
    | text      = I am going to guess that he makes the biggest deal out of this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:38.880
    | text      = I'm not stoked, because also it sounds like-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:41.759
    | text      = I'm fucking stoked as shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:42.640
    | text      = It sounds like in the clip that he's actually just mad they think that he would send a fan
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:48.079
    | text      = letter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:48.799
    | text      = No, no, no, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:49.839
    | text      = He sounds like, and they think I would send a fan letter?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:53.519
    | text      = How dare them?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:54.480
    | text      = So one of the things that's really interesting about this, and this is something that me
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:57.599
    | text      = and Marty discussed, is that they did not care about Alex Jones, the WWE.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:03.279
    | text      = This was far more about Glenn Beck.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:05.279
    | text      = Okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:06.000
    | text      = Because Glenn Beck was actually on mainstream TV at the time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:10.960
    | text      = Whereas Alex is just in his own platform.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:13.359
    | text      = So in the same way that Alex is trying to latch on to the WWE to try and get some attention,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:20.400
    | text      = the WWE recognized that this is also a really good carny thing for us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:25.440
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:26.319
    | text      = Because if we could fuck with them, we could all make money off this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:31.440
    | text      = This is good business for both of us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:33.359
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:33.680
    | text      = So as soon as the people like Glenn Beck and Alex Jones started to push back on them, they
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:41.279
    | text      = dove full on into it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:43.200
    | text      = But it turned bad, because Glenn Beck started calling wrestling fans idiots.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:48.240
    | text      = Oh no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:48.559
    | text      = And he started to get really shitty about wrestling fans and how they're all fucking
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:52.720
    | text      = stupid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:53.200
    | text      = And you're kind of even hearing Alex expressing some of that with the idea that they can't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:56.559
    | text      = tell what's real or not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:58.240
    | text      = So in an unprecedented event in pro wrestling, I don't know if I'm sure this may have happened
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:05.440
    | text      = at some other point, but I can't think of another time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:08.319
    | text      = Jack Swagger and Zeb Colter cut a promo where they explained what wrestling is to Glenn
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:14.079
    | text      = Beck.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:15.920
    | text      = And here is the beginning of that promo.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:18.720
    | text      = My name is Zeb Colter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:20.559
    | text      = And I am Jack Swagger.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:22.960
    | text      = And we are real Americans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:25.519
    | text      = We believe in the First Amendment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:27.359
    | text      = We say the things that need to be said, whether people want to hear them or not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:31.599
    | text      = We are here to prevent this once great country from eroding into bankruptcy, both financially
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:38.319
    | text      = and morally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:39.519
    | text      = We believe in some very simple principles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:42.559
    | text      = We believe that if you live in this country, you shouldn't speak Spanish, Chinese, Arabic,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:50.000
    | text      = German, or hell, even pig Latin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:52.880
    | text      = You should speak English.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:21:55.119
    | text      = We believe that real Americans are struggling to find jobs because people from other countries
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:00.079
    | text      = are sneaking across our borders and are willing to work for next to no money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:06.960
    | text      = They're stealing jobs from real Americans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:10.720
    | text      = Thieves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:11.759
    | text      = And we believe that if you sneak across our borders and are in our country illegally,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:18.000
    | text      = then you should leave.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:18.880
    | text      = And if you don't want to leave, well, that's where Jack and I come in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:22.480
    | text      = We will make you leave.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:24.480
    | text      = And we believe that the world champion of WWE, Alberto Del Rio, is a perfect example
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:32.160
    | text      = of the problems that plague our country, which is why Jack Swagger is going to beat Alberto
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:38.000
    | text      = Del Rio at WrestleMania, win the world title, and begin to set things right in this country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:45.119
    | text      = But Jack won't be alone.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:46.799
    | text      = He will have an army of support behind him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:49.839
    | text      = We, the people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:22:57.119
    | text      = Hey, Glenn Beck, what you just saw, we call a promo.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:02.319
    | text      = It's a scene we record to elicit a positive or negative reaction from our fans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:23:06.960
    | text      = See, we are entertainers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:21.839
    | text      = So they did it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:22.720
    | text      = Linda McMahon ran for Senate in Connecticut in 2010 and 2012.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:27.039
    | text      = She's mostly remembered for losing both times and spending shitloads of money on each campaign.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:32.319
    | text      = She spent approximately $100 million on those two campaigns.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:36.319
    | text      = And according to USA Today, $77 million of that was her own money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:40.880
    | text      = Even after she lost those races, she stayed around in the world of politics as a mega
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:44.559
    | text      = donor for Republican candidates.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:46.720
    | text      = What you have to understand is that the WWE has a whole hell of a lot to lose if they're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:50.960
    | text      = subjected to regulation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:52.640
    | text      = The way they classify their wrestlers as independent contractors has been the subject of a lot
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:56.799
    | text      = of conversation recently.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:31:58.319
    | text      = And if they had to treat them like an employee with the protections that come from that designation,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:03.359
    | text      = their profits would be cut drastically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:06.240
    | text      = Spending $100 million on politics is a pretty small loss compared to what they would lose
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:10.720
    | text      = if more left-leaning ideas about workers' rights were to become ascendant and more universally
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:14.880
    | text      = applied.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:15.519
    | text      = The idea of these people who are, like, growing old with these injuries that they sustained
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:20.160
    | text      = from years and years of wrestling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:21.839
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:22.400
    | text      = Like, there's so many protections that would cost them hundreds and hundreds of millions
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:26.079
    | text      = of dollars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:26.799
    | text      = So to fight back against that, it makes sense to give millions and millions of dollars to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:31.519
    | text      = people who will help protect the business.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:33.039
    | text      = Yeah, every part of that is logical and makes sense in the world we live in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:36.720
    | text      = It's the absolute nightmarish worst.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:39.359
    | text      = What?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:39.759
    | text      = That can't be allowed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:40.880
    | text      = That can't be okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:42.000
    | text      = In the 2016 campaign, Linda McMahon donated $7 million to Trump-aligned super PACs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:48.000
    | text      = She and Vince were big supporters of Trump's campaign, which shouldn't surprise anyone
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:51.920
    | text      = too much since Donald Trump was entered into the WWE Hall of Fame in 2013.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:32:56.720
    | text      = And he was inducted into the Hall by Vince McMahon himself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:00.720
    | text      = From 1995 to the present day, the only two people that Vince McMahon gave Hall of Fame
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:05.599
    | text      = induction speeches for were Donald Trump and Stone Cold Steve Austin.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:10.079
    | text      = Also...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:10.400
    | text      = I hate everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:11.200
    | text      = Yeah, it's crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:11.519
    | text      = I hate everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:12.880
    | text      = What?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:14.079
    | text      = No!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:14.559
    | text      = How do you not...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:15.200
    | text      = If you're Vince McMahon, how do you not give Stone Cold's induction speech?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:18.640
    | text      = Like the two of them were such a big part of the Attitude Era, the defining feud of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:25.519
    | text      = that time, makes total sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:27.200
    | text      = And then Donald Trump.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:28.559
    | text      = Jesus Christ.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:29.759
    | text      = Also, a little fun irony, the WWE Hall of Fame ceremony takes place on WrestleMania
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:34.880
    | text      = weekend.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:35.680
    | text      = It's all part of a days-long celebration that they have.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:38.720
    | text      = Trump was inducted in 2013, which if you're paying attention, is the same year when Alberto
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:43.359
    | text      = Del Rio fought Jack Swagger at WrestleMania.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:46.000
    | text      = It's the same year that we're talking about right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:48.079
    | text      = And that's why he ran for president in the first place.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:50.960
    | text      = He was just mad that Del Rio won.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:52.720
    | text      = Could have been.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:53.599
    | text      = Also, Trump was booed off stage when he gave his acceptance speech.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:56.720
    | text      = Yay!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:33:57.279
    | text      = It turns out the New York crowd was not super into a guy they were very familiar with who's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:01.359
    | text      = been a piece of shit locally for a couple decades.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:03.839
    | text      = Yeah, pretty much everybody in New York hates him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:05.599
    | text      = Yeah, bad idea to induct Trump into the Hall of Fame in New York, I think.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:09.360
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:09.840
    | text      = So the McMahons and Trump have had a really interesting relationship over the years.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:14.000
    | text      = They began working together in 1988 when Trump was instrumental in helping the then-WWF bring
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:19.679
    | text      = WrestleMania IV to Atlantic City.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:22.159
    | text      = They hosted the event at the Atlantic City Convention Hall, which was called Trump Plaza
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:26.400
    | text      = in advertisements.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:27.760
    | text      = They would return to the venue for WrestleMania V, making it the only place to host the event
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:32.239
    | text      = in two consecutive years ever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:34.639
    | text      = In 2004, when WrestleMania was in New York, Donald Trump was in attendance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:38.719
    | text      = Jesse Ventura interviewed him and asked if he was, uh, if Ventura were to get back into
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:43.119
    | text      = politics, could he count on Trump's support?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:45.840
    | text      = Trump said 100%, to which Ventura yells to the crowd that it seems like we need a wrestler
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:51.840
    | text      = in the White House in 2008.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:53.760
    | text      = It's very grim to watch in hindsight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:56.719
    | text      = Man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:34:57.119
    | text      = Also, Jesse Ventura very heavily dying his beard at that point.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:01.119
    | text      = Oh, okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:02.159
    | text      = Very dark beard.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:03.199
    | text      = That was, that was when he was doing that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:04.559
    | text      = Was, had he already gone completely bald at that point?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:07.280
    | text      = I don't, I don't, he might have been wearing a bandana.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:09.199
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:09.599
    | text      = He's pretty cool, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:10.480
    | text      = He is pretty cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:11.280
    | text      = In January 2007, Vince McMahon was in the ring doing, uh, during what was supposed to be,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:16.559
    | text      = uh, fan appreciation night on Raw.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:19.119
    | text      = But instead of appreciating the fans, he proceeded to call them ungrateful and basically made
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:23.119
    | text      = it all about himself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:24.559
    | text      = In the middle of his skit, he's interrupted by Trump on the big screen, who tells him
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:28.639
    | text      = that he's, uh, he tells him that he's better than Vince, uh, and then Trump jumps, uh,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:32.719
    | text      = he dumped a bunch of money on the fans out of the sky.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:35.280
    | text      = And it thus began a feud between Vince and Trump called the Battle of the Billionaires.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:39.440
    | text      = I hate everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:40.559
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:40.800
    | text      = I hate everything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:41.920
    | text      = Trump was even then, uh, obviously in no shape to wrestle, even though, uh, Vince swole as
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:47.679
    | text      = hell.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:48.320
    | text      = Uh, so they decided to choose fighters to represent them who would then compete in a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:52.159
    | text      = hair versus hair match.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:53.840
    | text      = The loser would have to shave their head.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:55.519
    | text      = And if you're not an idiot you knew from minute one, that means Trump was going to win.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:59.199
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:35:59.760
    | text      = There's no way Trump's shaving his head.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:01.039
    | text      = Not a chance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:01.840
    | text      = Vince chose Umaga to be his fighter and Trump chose Bobby Lashley, who he described in an
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:07.199
    | text      = interview with Imus, Don Imus, as quote, Bobby Lindsay, a black gentleman and the strongest
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:12.960
    | text      = man I've ever seen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:16.239
    | text      = Did-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:16.880
    | text      = Bobby Lindsay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:17.840
    | text      = Did he, did he just mandingo us?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:20.800
    | text      = Did that just happen?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:22.480
    | text      = It's a mess.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:23.440
    | text      = So Stone Cold was the special ref for the match.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:25.840
    | text      = So after Lashley won and they shaved Vince's head, Stone Cold and Trump celebrated in Stone
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:30.639
    | text      = Cold fashion, which is to say that Stone Cold chugged some beers and then gave Trump a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:34.320
    | text      = stunner.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:35.199
    | text      = It's completely bizarre and very grim in hindsight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:38.800
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:39.199
    | text      = This is all, this is all a tragic, tragic thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:43.039
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:43.760
    | text      = Now what's interesting about this is the timing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:46.480
    | text      = This was in January 2007 and that collaboration between Trump and the McMahons, that's the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:51.599
    | text      = point when it was heating up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:53.039
    | text      = But behind closed doors, behind the scenes, they were collaborating a bit more as well.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:36:58.159
    | text      = Donald Trump had been running the Trump Foundation, which New York Attorney General Barbara Underwood
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:02.639
    | text      = described as being engaged in a quote, shocking pattern of illegality.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:07.119
    | text      = In their 2015 IRS filing, the foundation admits to self-dealing or transferring assets or
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:12.559
    | text      = income to disqualified individuals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:14.800
    | text      = He used more than $250,000 of foundation money to settle disputes arising from his golf courses
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:20.159
    | text      = and hotels.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:21.039
    | text      = He used $20,000 of foundation money to buy a portrait of himself that no one else wanted
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:25.360
    | text      = to buy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:26.159
    | text      = It doesn't seem like too much of a controversial statement to say that there is a pattern of
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:31.280
    | text      = illegal behavior surrounding the Trump Foundation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:35.119
    | text      = You could have gotten rid of the foundation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:37.679
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:37.920
    | text      = But I'm talking specifically about that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:39.519
    | text      = Oh, okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:40.000
    | text      = So Trump stopped putting his own money into the Trump Foundation in 2006.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:46.719
    | text      = And his biggest donor in 2007 was Vince McMahon, who gave the Trump Foundation $4 million in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:53.119
    | text      = 2007.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:54.480
    | text      = The foundation's total stated fundraising that year was $4.1 million.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:37:58.480
    | text      = And Vince McMahon would go on to give another million in 2009.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:03.039
    | text      = If you count it all up, you're looking at an amount over $12 million that the McMahons
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:07.679
    | text      = have given to Trump between 2007 and 2016.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:10.800
    | text      = So it makes a lot of sense that when Trump was elected, one of his first positions he
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:14.320
    | text      = filled was to make Linda McMahon his head of the Small Business Administration.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:18.559
    | text      = She served in that position until recently.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:20.800
    | text      = On April 15th, 2019, it was announced that she was going to be moving on to become the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:25.199
    | text      = chair of the pro-Trump super PAC America First Action, the exact same super PAC that Sheriff
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:30.800
    | text      = David Clark became board member of after he left the sheriff's office.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:34.320
    | text      = Former Trump campaign manager Corey Lewandowski is also a senior adviser for America First
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:39.679
    | text      = Action.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:40.639
    | text      = Fun fact, America First Action between 2016 and 2018 spent over $460,000 of the money
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:47.599
    | text      = that it brought in at Trump-owned properties.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:50.639
    | text      = They paid over $120,000 to two firms directly tied to Sheriff David Clark.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:38:55.920
    | text      = There is a clear pattern that you can decide for yourself.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:00.559
    | text      = I don't like that all of this is happening.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:05.679
    | text      = I think it's bad first.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:08.079
    | text      = I think the thing that I hate most about it is probably how obvious it is and blatant
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:14.239
    | text      = and how nobody's doing anything about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:16.000
    | text      = Yeah, a lot of people have made some pretty salient points about how it seems like these
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:20.559
    | text      = Trump super PACs are just places where people who get cast off and maybe know stuff end
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:39:27.840

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
